heading: Pharma
content: MicroFab machines run with hygienic packaging processes, which is important for dairy products and when contamination can affect quality. The advanced packaging technologies also help in extending the shelf life.

heading: Cosmetics
content: Our range of machines offer versatility for the creation of various packaging formats, thereby meeting the different preferences of consumers for most commonly used dairy and other products.

heading: Food
content: The machines of MicroFab are known for the ability to create single-dose packaging. These also support portion control, offering convenience to consumers.

heading: Chemicals
content: As the different processes are integrated into one continuous operation, MicroFab machines reduce the production time and enhance the overall efficiency in dairy packaging.
